title: Best of The Herd for May 05, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 05, 2020
description:
Michael Jordan is being authentic, the sports media shouldn't ask for anything different from him

OBJ needs to lower his expectations for 2020

Trevor Lawrence is a much better prospect than Joe Burrow 

Guests: JA Adande, former Chicago and Los Angeles Sports Writer

Penny Hardaway, Memphis Head Coach and Magic PG

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
